name: On Board of SS Aeryn
description:
Help irish migrant Neil O'Fallon to find his wife Mailin who disappeared after passing the Atlantic ocean from Tralee to New York harbour and explore the incidents of the journey

A text-based investigation game that has been created for SecretSanta-Jam

References:

All assets have either been created during the jam, or are CC0-licenced except this asset(this license)
